text: Josef Göppel (16 August 1950 – 13 April 2022) was a German politician. He was born in Herrieden, Bavaria. He represented the CSU. He was a member of the Bundestag from the state of Bavaria from 2002 until 2017. Göppel died on 13 April 2022 in Munich, Germany from problems caused by kidney disease, aged 71.CSU-Umweltpolitiker Josef Göppel gestorben ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Politicians from Bavaria Category:Deaths from kidney disease
title: Josef Göppel
